name: Meat Truck Mania
description:
This is the first game I've finished. It's not spectacular and it has no real goal but it's finished. It took longer than expected and I wanted to quit but here it is. If you're working on something just finish it, do whatever it takes,  it feels real good.

Drive a truck to collect meat from around the city. Take the meat back to the MEATHAUS to process it into food. After the food is loaded in the truck take to any customers who have called in an order. Filling an order boosts your Rating. Keep your rating above 0. Failing to fill a customers order in time lowers your Rating.
